General.Name: Anhui Ankai Automobile Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Ankai Automobile Co., Ltd manufactures and sells large, medium, and light buses and automotive parts in China. The company offers various coaches, city buses, school buses, and new energy buses. It exports its products to approximately 80 countries and regions, including the United States, the United Kingdom, France, Italy, Australia, Saudi Arabia, Mexico, etc. The company was founded in 1966 and is based in Hefei, China. Anhui Ankai Automobile Co., Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Group Co., Ltd.
